זְ֭רַמְתָּם <S%H2229><s%> Ze-ram-tom Thou carriest them away as with a flood שֵׁנָ֣ה <S%H8142><s%> she-Nah they are [as] a sleep יִהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu; fall בַּ֝בֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker, in the morning כֶּחָצִ֥יר <S%H2682><s%> ke-cha-Tzir [they are] like grass יַחֲלֹֽף׃ <S%H2498><s%> ya-cha-Lof. [which] groweth up

בַּ֭בֹּקֶר <S%H1242><s%> Bab-bo-ker In the morning יָצִ֣יץ <S%H6692><s%> ya-Tzitz it flourisheth וְחָלָ֑ף <S%H2498><s%> ve-cha-Laf; and groweth up לָ֝עֶ֗רֶב <S%H6153><s%> la-'E-rev, in the evening יְמוֹלֵ֥ל <S%H4135><s%> ye-mo-Lel it is cut down וְיָבֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> ve-ya-Vesh. and withereth

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for כָלִ֥ינוּ <S%H3615><s%> cha-Li-nu For we are consumed בְאַפֶּ֑ךָ <S%H639><s%> ve-'ap-Pe-cha; by thine anger וּֽבַחֲמָתְךָ֥ <S%H2534><s%> u-va-cha-ma-te-Cha and by thy wrath נִבְהָֽלְנוּ׃ <S%H926><s%> niv-Hal-nu. are we troubled

שַׁתָּ sha-ta כשַׁתָּ֣ה <S%H7896><s%> shat-Tah apply קעֲוֹנֹתֵ֣ינוּ <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-no-Tei-nu our iniquities לְנֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5048><s%> le-neg-De-cha; before עֲ֝לֻמֵ֗נוּ <S%H5956><s%> 'a-lu-Me-nu, before thee our secret לִמְא֥וֹר <S%H3974><s%> lim-'or [sins] in the light פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha. of thy countenance

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol for all יָ֭מֵינוּ <S%H3117><s%> Ya-mei-nu For all our days פָּנ֣וּ <S%H6437><s%> pa-Nu are passed away בְעֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5678><s%> ve-'ev-ra-Te-cha; in thy wrath כִּלִּ֖ינוּ <S%H3615><s%> kil-Li-nu we spend שָׁנֵ֣ינוּ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nei-nu our years כְמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> che-mov- like הֶֽגֶה׃ <S%H1899><s%> He-geh. as a tale

יְמֵֽי־ <S%H3117><s%> ye-mei- The days שְׁנוֹתֵ֨ינוּ <S%H8141><s%> she-no-Tei-nu of our years בָהֶ֥ם va-Hem שִׁבְעִ֪ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im and ten שָׁנָ֡ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וְאִ֤ם <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im if בִּגְבוּרֹ֨ת׀ <S%H1369><s%> big-vu-Rot and if by reason of strength שְׁמ֘וֹנִ֤ים <S%H8084><s%> she-Mo-Nim [they be] fourscore שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years וְ֭רָהְבָּם <S%H7296><s%> Ve-ra-he-bom yet [is] their strength עָמָ֣ל <S%H5999><s%> 'a-Mal labour וָאָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> va-'A-ven; and sorrow כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גָ֥ז <S%H1468><s%> gaz cut off חִ֝֗ישׁ <S%H2440><s%> Chish, for it is soon וַנָּעֻֽפָה׃ <S%H5774><s%> van-na-'U-fah. and we fly away

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who י֭וֹדֵעַ <S%H3045><s%> Yo-de-a' Who knoweth עֹ֣ז <S%H5797><s%> 'oz the power אַפֶּ֑ךָ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pe-cha; of your anger וּ֝כְיִרְאָתְךָ֗ <S%H3374><s%> u-che-yir-'a-te-cha, to the fear עֶבְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5678><s%> 'ev-ra-Te-cha. [so is] thy wrath

לִמְנ֣וֹת <S%H4487><s%> lim-Not [us] to number יָ֭מֵינוּ <S%H3117><s%> Ya-mei-nu our days כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken So הוֹדַ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> ho-Da'; So teach וְ֝נָבִ֗א <S%H935><s%> ve-na-Vi, that we may apply לְבַ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav [our] hearts חָכְמָֽה׃ <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah unto wisdom

שׁוּבָ֣ה <S%H7725><s%> shu-Vah Return יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against מָתָ֑י <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai; how וְ֝הִנָּחֵ֗ם <S%H5162><s%> ve-hin-na-Chem, how long;and let it repent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha. thee concerning thy servants
